channel.title: MonTransit
channel.description: Latest news about the MonTransit app

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: Twitter/X📰 and YouTube📺 news providers improvements✨, getting ready for new🆕 exo/RTL/STS real-time🛰️ Chrono⚜️ API, 188 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: added 🎟️fares/pricing💲 informationℹ️, moved button to add/edit/remove to favorites⭐, better error🙁 screens, 192 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: better compatibility with long network closures😞 in schedules🗓️ #REMMtl, 199 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: added🆕 Williams Lake Transit buses🚌, compatibility with new Winnipeg Transit API🔀, better app news📰, 179 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: always show times⌚ in local📍 time-zone instead of device📱 time-zone, 163 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: making it easier & faster🚄 to add new🆕 transit agencies (WIP)🔄, 271 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: improvements to latest news📰 loading and text search🔍 user interface, 154 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: bug fixes & performance improvements, 218 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: full compatibility with Android 15 Vanilla Ice Cream🍦 including Edge-to-Edge↕️ UI✨, news📰 video📺 player, 217 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: initial compatibility with Android 15 Vanilla Ice Cream🍦, 173 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: new dots UI 🟦🟥🟩⬜ for bike🚲 stations availability, less⬇️ annoying😖 "new schedule available" prompts💬, 198 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: reached 1M+ downloads⬇️ on Google Play Store!💚, better nearby🎯 connections🔀 in stop/station screen #UserRequest, improved real time🛰️ service alerts severityℹ️⚠️ and data updates reliability🦾, 252 service updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: faster💨 & more secure🔑 data updates (also ignore insignificant🤏 data changes), 283 service updates🔁

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: added Canada VIA Rail trains🚆 https://bit.ly/MonTransitVIARailTrains, 267 service updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: getting ready for latest bike sharing data updates, modernizing code architecture, 263 service updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: bug fixes & performance improvements, 236 service updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: bug fixes & performance improvements, 206 service updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: improved route short name and ➡️direction as well as service alertsℹ️⚠️ UI✨, updated service alerts⚠️ for BC Transit buses🚍, said goodbye👋 to Android 5 Lollipop🍭 (2014) and Android 6 Marshmallow ⬜ (2015), 251 service updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: started UI improvements✨ , added🆕 service alerts⚠️ to Barrie Transit, Brampton Transit, Calgary Transit, Cornwall Transit, ETS, GRT, MiWay, StAT, Strathcona County, 276 schedule updates🔁…
